name: Quality Evaluation
description: Evaluate artifacts (PRs, mission outputs, signals) against defined quality gates and policy rules. Produce structured evaluation reports.

outputs.description: Structured evaluation report with pass/fail and recommendations.

permissions.justification: Evaluation is a read-only activity. Reports are filed as new artifacts, not mutations of existing ones.

constraints: Must not modify the artifact being evaluated.
Evaluation reports must cite specific policy rules.
